  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      called by fxmlloader upon controller initialization

    • loadKS

      private void loadKS()
      method that (re)loads the keystore from files

    • openCertsWindow

      private void openCertsWindow​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      executes on menu use, opens utility for managing keystore and pauses main window till done
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - called by UI Event

    • sign

      private void sign​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      signing process called by button press. checks if output directory and keypair are selected, asks for password for key use, constructs and signs the hashtree from the files and saves it into the output directory serialized into json format. progress is output using the progress bar
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - called on UI action

    • generate

      private void generate​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      signature generation process called by button press. checks if source tree and output directory have been selected, generates JSWs for the selected files one after the other
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - called on UI action

    • verify

      private void verify​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      verification process called by button press. checks if signature file has been selected and uses JOSE library functionality and custom verifier class
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - called on UI action

    • parseJWS

      public void parseJWS​(File file)
      called by application upon JWS file selection
      Parameters:
      file - file passed from filechooser by main application

    • setOutpDir

      public void setOutpDir​(@Nullable @Nullable File file)
      called by application upon output directory selection
      Parameters:
      file - file Object passed from directorychooser

    • setGenOutpDir

      public void setGenOutpDir​(@Nullable @Nullable File file)
      called by application upon output directory selection
      Parameters:
      file - file Object passed from directorychooser

    • addFilesToSign

      public void addFilesToSign​(Collection<File> files)
      called by the application whenever files are selected to be added to the signing tab file list
      Parameters:
      files - selected files passed by multiplefilechooser

    • addFilesToGen

      public void addFilesToGen​(Collection<File> files)
      called by the application whenever files are selected to be added to the generation tab file list
      Parameters:
      files - selected files passed by multiplefilechooser

    • parseTreeJSON

      public void parseTreeJSON​(File treeFile)
      called by application whenever a tree file is selected to be used in signature generation
      Parameters:
      treeFile - file passed by filechooser
